article: indian prime minister manmohan singh said here tuesday india will identify and separate its civilian and military nuclear facilities and place its civilian nuclear facilities under international atomic energy agency -lrb- iaea -rrb- safeguards .
abstract: india pledges to put civilian nuclear facilities under iaea safeguards
candidates: indian prime minister manmohan singh said here t tuesday india will identify and separate its civilian and military nuclear facilities.
